Class.Name: Warlock
Class.Description:
Warlocks are arcane spell casters who form pacts with powerful beings to gain power and magic, and often seek out rare and forbidden knowledge. They deal moderate amounts of damage with their Eldritch Blast but they do not require spell points to do so, ensuring a steady stream of magic damage at no cost. They have no offensive magic but do have a variety of buffing, crowd control, and utility spells. Warlocks have moderate defenses against physical attacks, but can defend against magical spells better than most other classes. Charisma is the primary attribute for warlocks, increasing the effectiveness of their spells and their Eldritch Blast, and increasing their maximum spell points.
Warlocks are free for VIP accounts, but others must purchase the class in the DDO store.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Dark Delirium
Feat.Description: Plunge one enemy's mind into an illusory realm. that enemy is dazed and cannot act for 20 seconds. Each time this enemy is damaged, there's a 10% chance they break free. Does not affect bosses. There is no saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Dark One's Luck
Feat.Description: +2 to all saving throws

Feat.Name: Warlock: Celestial Attunement
Feat.Description: +5 Physical Resistance Rating, +1 to all Saving Throws

Feat.Name: Warlock: Unhallowed Flesh
Feat.Description: +5 Physical and Magical Resistance Rating

Feat.Name: Warlock: Frozen Footsteps
Feat.Description: +10% Cold Absorption

Feat.Name: Warlock: Deceive Item
Feat.Description: +5 Use Magic Device

Feat.Name: Warlock: Eldritch Blast Damage
Feat.Description: +1d8 Eldritch Blast base Damage

Feat.Name: Warlock: Eldritch Blast Focused
Feat.Description:
Eldritch blast Shape: Toggle on to turn your basic attack into a ranged magical bolt dealing 1d8 force damage.
This is treated as an evocation spell, and damage sales with 150% spell power. It is also affected normally by spell critical chance and spell critical damage. Gaining more Warlock levels grants feats that increase this damage.
This is not affected by metamagic feats, nor by melee and ranged feats. medium armor, heavy armor and shields can cause Eldritch Blast to suffer Arcane Spell Failure.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Entropic Ward
Feat.Description: +5 MRR, 25 Fortification

Feat.Name: Warlock: Hurl Through Hell
Feat.Description: Cooldown: 25 seconds. Exile one target enemy from this existence. An enemy succeeding on a Will save vs DC(15 + Charisma Modifier + Necromancy DCs) is instead paralyzed and helpless with fear for 6 seconds.

DC.Name: Warlock: Hurl Through Hell
DC.Description: Exile one target enemy from this existence. An enemy succeeding on a Will save is instead paralyzed and helpless with fear for 6 seconds.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Misty escape
Feat.Description: You become invisible and charge forward. During your escape, you move through monsters as if you were ethereal. These effects last for six seconds

Feat.Name: Warlock: Ameliorate
Feat.Description: Attempt to obliterate an Undead, or severely weaken any non-Undead foe. Undead must succeed on a Will save vs DC(15 + Warlock level + Charisma Mod) or be destroyed. Undead who fail this save, or enemies who are not undead, instead are terrorized and have their Magical resistance Rating reduced by 10 for 15 seconds.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Channel the Abyss
Feat.Description: Shroud yourself in the Abyss, which will grant you unholy power at a cost. You gain +2 Charisma, +10 Negative Healing Amplification, and +10 Negative Spell Power. You have +100% critical hit resistance, are healed by Negative Energy, take 50% healing from Positive Energy, and take double damage from Light. You are considered Undead rather than your original type for the purposes of most effects.

Stance.Name: Channel the Abyss
Stance.Description: Shroud yourself in the Abyss, which will grant you unholy power at a cost. You gain +2 Charisma, +10 Negative Healing Amplification, and +10 Negative Spell Power. You have +100% critical hit resistance, are healed by Negative Energy, take 50% healing from Positive Energy, and take double damage from Light. You are considered Undead rather than your original type for the purposes of most effects.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Absolute Zero
Feat.Description: Attempt to lock a single enemy in ice - permanently. Enemies must success on a Will save vs DC(15 + Warlock level + Charisma Mod) or be forever trapped in solid ice. Enemies made of fire will instead be destroyed with no save. Does not affect bosses.

DC.Name: Warlock: Absolute Zero
DC.Description: Attempt to lock a single enemy in ice - permanently. Enemies must success on a Will save vs DC(15 + Warlock level + Charisma Mod) or be forever trapped in solid ice. Enemies made of fire will instead be destroyed with no save. Does not affect bosses.

Feat.Name: Pact Damage
Feat.Description: +1d6 Eldritch Blast base Damage

Feat.Name: Pact: Fey
Feat.Description: Your patron is a lord or lady of the fey, a creature of legend who holds secrets that were forgotten before the mortal races were born. This being's motivations are often inscrutable and sometimes whimsical and might involve a striving for greater magical power or the settling of age-old grudges. Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Sonic damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses) Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Obscuring Mist 5 - Blindness 9 - Slow 14 - Greater Dispel Magic 17 - Otto's Sphere of Dancing 19 - Otto's Irresistible Dance

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blast: Focused
Stance.Description: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Sonic damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Pact: Fey
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Sonic damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw.

Feat.Name: Pact: Fiend
Feat.Description: You have made a pact with a fiend from the lower planes of existence, a being whose aims are evil, even if you strive against those aims. Such beings desire the corruption or destruction of all things, ultimately including you. Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Fire damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses). Cannot be activated if Good. Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Command 5 - Rage 9 - Fire Shield 14 - Binding Chain 17 - Power Word: Blind 19 - Howl of Terror

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blast: Focused
Stance.Description: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Fire damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Pact: Fiend
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Fire damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw.

Feat.Name: Pact: Great Old One
Feat.Description: Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Acid damage, plus 1d4 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses). Can not be activated if Lawful. Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1, 5, 9, 14, 17, 19: 1 - Entangle 5 - Knock 9 - Phantasmal Killer 14 - Dominate Person 17 - Mass Suggestion 19 - Power Word: Kill

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blast: Focused
Stance.Description: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Acid damage, plus 1d4 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Pact: Great Old One
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Acid damage, plus 1d4 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw.

Feat.Name: Pact: Celestial
Feat.Description:
Your patron is a divine Celestial, patron of those who wish to devote themselves to an unconventional method of worship. You will learn to channel the light and air around you into a righteous weapon, and utilize holy abilities to help your friends and pass judgment upon your enemies.
Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Electric damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses) Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Bless 5 - Soundburst 9 - Magic Circle Against Evil 14 - Prayer 17 - Holy Aura 19 - Freedom of Movement

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blast: Focused
Stance.Description: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Electric damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Pact: Celestial
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Electric damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw.

Feat.Name: Pact: The Abyss
Feat.Description:
Your patron is of the Abyss - a pit of darkness beyond comprehension, a desire and a hunger beyond meaning itself. Tread carefully.
Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Negative damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses) Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Mage Armor 5 - Spawn Screen 9 - Halt Undead 14 - Death Aura 17 - Symbol of Pain 19 - Rend the Soul

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blast: Focused
Stance.Description: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Negative damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Pact: The Abyss
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Negative damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw.

Feat.Name: Pact: The Carceri Storm
Feat.Description:
Your patron is a demonic entity from the realm of Carceri, otherwise known as Tarterus. The bitter cold and freezing winds will chill you to your bones, but if you can master the power granted to you, great things will surely come your way...
Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Cold damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses) Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Merfolk's Blessing 5 - Gust of Wind 9 - Creeping Cold 14 - Ice Storm 17 - Niac's Biting Cold 19 - Greater Creeping Cold

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blast: Focused
Stance.Description: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Cold damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Pact: The Carceri Storm
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1 Cold damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Paragon's Aegis
Feat.Description: +5 MRR

Feat.Name: Warlock: Create Thrall
Feat.Description: Charm monster

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Blindness
Feat.Description: Renders an enemy blinded. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Rage
Feat.Description: This area of effect spell grants to targets +2 morale bonus to Strength and to Constitution, +1 morale bonus on will saves and a -2 penalty to Armor Class. The spell's duration is 60 + 6 seconds per caster level.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Knock
Feat.Description: Unlocks locked doors and chests as if a Rogue with a Open Lock skill of caster level+casting ability modifier (Charisma for Warlocks) was attempting to pick the lock.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Soundburst
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Spawn Screen
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Gust of Wind
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Slow
Feat.Description: One target moves at 50% run speed, attacks at a 30% slowed rate, -1 on Attack rolls, Armor Class and Reflex saves. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Fire Shield
Feat.Description: Wreaths the caster in hot or cold flames. Any creature striking you in melee takes 1d3+3 plus 1 per caster level (Maximum caster level 15.) damage. The Fire version of this spell deals fire damage and reduces damage the caster takes from cold by half. The cold version of this spell deals cold damage and reduces damage the caster takes from fire by half. The flame from the fire version will burn away any webs that attempt to entangle you.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Phantasmal Killer
Feat.Description: A target who fails a Will saving throw followed by a failed Fortitude saving throw dies from fear. A successful Fortitude save still results in 1d3 + 1 damage per caster level. A Will save disbelieves the spell and negates ill effects.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Magic Circle against Evil
Pact Magic: Greater Dispel Magic
Feat.Description: Removes ongoing spells that have been cast on a target. You must make a caster level check of 1d20+your caster level (Maximum caster level 20.) of DC 11+spell's caster level to remove an effect. In addition, this spell can be used to sever the connection between a summoner and his or her summoned monster, causing the summoned creature to attack unpredictably, possibly turning on its summoner. If cast on a spell ward trap, this spell will reduce the level of the trap by 1d4 levels. If the level of the trap is reduced to 0, the trap is disabled.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Binding Chain
Feat.Description: Spell info here

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Dominate Person
Feat.Description: You can control the actions of any humanoid creature that fails its Will save through a telepathic link that you establish with the subjects mind. Dominate acts like Charm Person, with additional Will saves every 15 to 30 seconds, but the creature will follow you throughout the dungeon.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Prayer
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Death Aura
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Ice Storm
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Otto's Sphere of Dancing
Feat.Description: A magical sphere that compels all enemies who enter it to dance. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Power Word: Blind
Feat.Description: A single word of power is uttered, causing your target to become Blinded. Creatures are Blinded for at least 6+6d4 seconds and players are Blinded for at least 4+1d6 seconds. Creatures with more than 100,000 Hit Points are unaffected by Power Word: Blind.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Mass Suggestion
Feat.Description: Casts Suggestion on multiple enemies. The actions of affected enemies are influenced by you, allowing you to suggest that they fight as your allies for 6 seconds per caster level. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Holy Aura
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Symbol of Pain
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Niac's Biting Cold
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Otto's Irresistible Dance
Feat.Description: This spell makes it impossible for the enemy to do anything other than caper and prance in place.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Howl of Terror
Feat.Description: You utter a terrifying howl, filling your foes with a paralyzing fear. Foes around you are paralyzed for 6 to 24 seconds. Will save negates.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Power Word: Kill
Feat.Description: A single word causes the death of a single enemy with no saving throw allowed. Cooldown timer of 210 seconds.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Freedom of Movement
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Rend the Soul
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Greater Creeping Cold
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Beguiling Defenses
Feat.Description: You naturally move in strange and unpredictable ways. +1 Reflex saving throws

Feat.Name: Fiendish Resilience
Feat.Description: You are unnaturally resilient due to your fiendish association. +1 Fortitude saving throws

Feat.Name: Thought Shield
Feat.Description: Your detachment from the physical means you are harder influence. +1 Will Saves

Feat.Name: Celestial Awareness
Feat.Description: +1 Reflex saving throws

Feat.Name: Abyssal Resilience
Feat.Description: +1 Fortitude saving throws

Feat.Name: Bulwark of the Storm
Feat.Description: +1 Will saving throws

Feat.Name: Fey Resistance
Feat.Description: +5 Sonic Resistance

Feat.Name: Fiendish Resistance
Feat.Description: +5 Fire Resistance

Feat.Name: Resistance of the Great Old One
Feat.Description: +5 Acid Resistance

Feat.Name: Celestial Resistance
Feat.Description: +5 Electric Resistance

Feat.Name: Abyssal Resistance
Feat.Description: +1 to Fire, Cold, Acid, Electric and Sonic Resistance

Feat.Name: Carceri Resistance
Feat.Description: +5 Cold Resistance

Feat.Name: Past Life: Warlock
Feat.Description: You were a Warlock in a past life. You occasionally find yourself throwing your hands into the air. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +3 Magical Resistance. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Delver of the Forbidden
Feat.Description: You recall more about your past life as a Warlock. You gain +3 to your Spellcraft skill. You can confuse an enemy for 12 seconds (no saving throw). This can be used ten times per rest.

Requirement.Item: Past Life: Warlock - Acolyte of the Skin
